title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Collar - Unveiling the Vaibhavam Haaram
materials: featuring a central Emerald of exceptional green color and clarity. Embellished with brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
G color) and vibrant pink sapphires with a round cut.
features: This stunning collar necklace showcases a harmonious blend of traditional Telugu jewelry design with modern aesthetics. The floral motif design is intricately crafted with pave-set diamonds, leading to a striking Emerald centerpiece. Five delicate drops, each featuring a cluster of pink sapphires set in a floral pattern and framed with diamonds, add a touch of femininity and grace. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, giving it a rich, warm glow.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (vratam)
or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement. Its modern design also allows it to be worn at upscale social events or cocktail parties.
description: This Vaibhavam Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a wearable piece of art. The combination of high-quality diamonds, a captivating Emerald, and vibrant pink sapphires makes it a truly unique and valuable piece. The intricate craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making. The design is versatile, blending traditional South Indian elements with a modern silhouette.
